(Prevedel Google) Ali lahko pridete do mesta z avtom? 

(Izvirnik)

featured_question.answer:
(Prevedel Google) Do vrha vodi asfaltna cesta, zadnja 2 km sta zelo ozka in strma, na vrhu pa je le nekaj parkirnih mest. Zadnji del ceste ni prevozen v Äasu zimskega snega. Avto lahko tudi pustimo ob cesti, ostale pa do vrha peÅ¡. Google zemljevidi vas bodo lepo vodili.

(Izvirnik)
There is an asphalt road to the top, the last 2 km are very narrow an steep, and there is only a couple parking spaces at the top. Last part of the roadd is not passable during winter snow. You can also leave the car along the road, and walk the rest to the top. Google maps will guide you nicely.
